vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔκ-θετος, ον,
sent out of the house, sent away, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; exposed, of a child, [NT+4th c.AD+]; cast away, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
__II projecting, salient, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; opposed to κρυπτός, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II.b neuter, ἔκθετον, τό, ={ἐκθέτης}, Al.[LXX]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
thrown out, exposed (to elements), abandoned
exposed, cast out, abandoned, Acts 7:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 驅逐, 逐出, 遺棄 (徒 7:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 驱逐, 逐出, 遗弃 (徒 7:19)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bị phơi bỏ; bỏ ra; bị bỏ rơi. ἐκ (G1537) + τίθημι (G5087)
